text:
Message 142 of 4024
Ok. School night rules. Sort of like I had Xmas morning. Great working with you!
Just think, in the future we can be in court all the time telling us what day Christmas is, and if New Year’s Day is recognized as a holiday in the United
States. Because between us, we both have different interpretations on those. Can’t wait!
Sent:12/31/2023 at 03:05 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/31/2023 at 03:16 PM)
Subject:Re: AD drop off
Message 143 of 4024
Hoping you can find the cycles for this soon. Thanks!
Sent:12/31/2023 at 04:05 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/31/2023 at 04:05 PM)
Subject:Re: Thoughts on Max (for tomorrow)
Message 144 of 4024
Please email me your thoughts. Phone calls are triggering for us both.
Thank you
Sent:12/31/2023 at 04:08 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/31/2023 at 04:09 PM)
Subject:Re: Thoughts on Max (for tomorrow)
Message 145 of 4024
You always have an excuse. For everything. If you can’t make time to have a talk about our child given the way he has responded to this situation
forget it. If you really don’t see a problem here that we urgently need professional help with I don’t know what to do.
Your way has not worked since Yurushaka when we promised to talk about discernment. Please recognize history for a moment and consider if we
have a problem we should address constructively. We used to work together even after this started. It worked.
Then you started shutting down our efforts. Stopping any help to understand the other’s perspective, or heal. Creating a destructive self fulfilling
prophecy of disaster. It’s not working. It’s getting worse. Please consider working with me before the courts make us.
Today this all started when I tried to do you a favor. Then another. Then you insult me and start a fight. I’m sure I do that crap as well to you. But we
should learn how to step back, own our own self-determination. And stop. But we really need help to do that.
I was dark all weekend so this would not happen. But we will have to talk sometime. Like we should for Max’s mental health. This is a very high stakes
game. Let’s please treat it with the care and respect it deserves. So we can talk about our kids mental health.
I’m really trying. Just tell me your terms even. I’ll likely do anything to be better parents because the status quo is not working. It’s really not a win if
Sent:12/31/2023 at 04:25 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/31/2023 at 04:40 PM)
Subject:Re: Thoughts on Max (for tomorrow)
